text: The 2005 All Thailand Golf Tour is the seventh season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2005 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Men's winner |- | 15 Jan || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|2,000,000 || Thammanoon Sriroj |- | 9 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (A-B) || align=right|1,000,000 || Prayad Marksaeng |- | 16 Jul || Chevrolet Championship || Burapha Golf Club (B-D) || align=right|1,000,000 || Chawalit Plaphol |- | 14 Aug || Cotto Open || Burapha Golf Club (C-D) || align=right|1,000,000 || Thammanoon Sriroj |- | 27 Aug || TPC Tour Championships || The Vintage Club || align=right|1,000,000 || Prom Meesawat |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2005 All Thailand Golf Tour
